code.display: Kansas City Cardiomyopathy Questionnaire [KCCQ]

code.display: KCCQ physical limitation score

item.text: KCCQ physical limitation score
KCCQ physical limitation score is calculated from the average of responses to 6 items (1a through 1f).

code.display: KCCQ social limitation score

item.text: KCCQ social limitation score
KCCQ social limitation score is calculated from the average of responses to 4 items (15a through 15d).

code.display: KCCQ quality of life score

item.text: KCCQ quality of life score
KCCQ quality of life score is calculated from the average of responses to 3 items (12 through 14).

code.display: KCCQ self-efficacy score

item.text: KCCQ self-efficacy score
KCCQ self-efficacy score is calculated from the average of responses to 2 items (10 and 11).

code.display: KCCQ symptom burden score

item.text: KCCQ symptom burden score
KCCQ symptom burden score is calculated from the average of responses to 3 items (4, 6, and 8).

code.display: KCCQ symptom frequency score

item.text: KCCQ symptom frequency score
KCCQ symptom frequency score is calculated from the average of responses to 4 items (3, 5, 7, and 9).

code.display: KCCQ symptom stability score

item.text: KCCQ symptom stability score
KCCQ symptom stability score is calculated from the response to 1 item (2).

code.display: KCCQ total symptom score

item.text: KCCQ total symptom score
KCCQ total symptom score is the mean of the following available summary scores: KCCQ symptom frequency score, KCCQ symptom burden score.

code.display: KCCQ clinical summary score

item.text: KCCQ clinical summary score
KCCQ clinical summary score is the mean of the following available summary scores: KCCQ physical limitation score, KCCQ total symptom score.

code.display: KCCQ overall summary score

item.text: KCCQ overall summary score
KCCQ overall summary score is the sum of responses from all 23 items.
